posts.post_content:
It's been a while since I shook this tree. 

Want to buy or trade for the following two T211s to help a friend finish his set. Have some T211s, T210-8s, and whatever else I can scrounge up to offer in trade.
PM or email at [url]burl@burlssports.com[/url]

Rogers Atlanta
Rohe New Orleans

Regards,
Burl
